name: SlackNotification
description: Slack Notification task with advanced slack message customization for Visual Studio Team Services. The task includes the ability to send optional attachments with the standard slack messages
author: Kasun Kodagoda

inputs.name: SlackApiToken
inputs.label: Slack API Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: Slack API Token generated from the [Slack Token Generator](https://api.slack.com/custom-integrations/legacy-tokens). Save the token in a secure build variable.

inputs.name: NotificationType
inputs.label: Notification Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the type of notification. Use _Chat Message_ to send a message to a slack Channel. Use _Upload File_ to upload a file to a slack channel

inputs.name: MessageAuthor
inputs.label: Message Author
inputs.helpMarkDown: Text shown as the author of the message in Slack.

inputs.name: IconUrl
inputs.label: Icon URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: The icon that will be shown along side the message.

inputs.name: Channel
inputs.label: Channel
inputs.helpMarkDown: Channel/User where the message is sent to. E.g. #general, @kasunk

inputs.name: Message
inputs.label: Message
inputs.helpMarkDown: Message that needs to be posted to Slack channel or user. [Message Formatting](https://api.slack.com/docs/messages)

inputs.name: AuthorName
inputs.label: Author Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Small text used to display the author's name.

inputs.name: AuthorLink
inputs.label: Author Link
inputs.helpMarkDown: A valid URL that will hyperlink the *Author Name* text mentioned above. Will only work if *Author Name* is present.

inputs.name: Title
inputs.label: Title
inputs.helpMarkDown: The *Title* is displayed as larger, bold text near the top of a message attachment.

inputs.name: TitleLink
inputs.label: Title Link
inputs.helpMarkDown: A valid URL will hyperlink the *Text* mentioned above.

inputs.name: PreText
inputs.label: Attachment Pre-Text
inputs.helpMarkDown: This is optional text that appears above the message attachment block.

inputs.name: Text
inputs.label: Attachment Text
inputs.helpMarkDown: This is the main text in a message attachment, and can contain [Standard Slack Message Markup](https://api.slack.com/docs/message-formatting).

inputs.name: Color
inputs.label: Border Color
inputs.helpMarkDown: Color of the border along the left side of the message attachment. Value that can either be one of *good*, *warning*, *danger*, or any *hex color code* (eg. #439FE0)

inputs.name: ImageUrl
inputs.label: Image URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: A valid URL to an image file that will be displayed inside a message attachment. Supports *gif*, *jpeg*, *png*, & *bmp* formats.

inputs.name: FooterText
inputs.label: Footer Text
inputs.helpMarkDown: Contextualize footer text for the attachment. Limited to 300 characters.

inputs.name: FooterIcon
inputs.label: Footer Icon
inputs.helpMarkDown: Publicly accessible URL string that render a small icon beside your footer text.

inputs.name: UploadFilePath
inputs.label: File to Upload
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the file to upload to slack channel.

inputs.name: FileComment
inputs.label: Comment
inputs.helpMarkDown: Initial comment to add to the file.
